name: slack-time-punch-workspace
description: Slack Time Punch App - TypeScript Monorepo with Server/Client separation, Docker support, and Tauri-ready architecture

scripts.build: npm run build --workspace=packages/server && npm run build --workspace=packages/client
scripts.clean: npm run clean --workspace=packages/server && npm run clean --workspace=packages/client
scripts.install:all: npm install && npm install --workspace=packages/server && npm install --workspace=packages/client
scripts.debug: concurrently --kill-others "npm run dev:server" "sleep 3 && npm run dev:client"
scripts.docker:server:restart: npm run docker:server:down && npm run docker:server:build && npm run docker:server:up
